constraint.title: Next.js 16 with App Router
constraint.description: Use App Router pattern with file-based routing in app/ directory. Server components by default. Turbopack enabled for dev server.

constraint.title: TailwindCSS 4.x with Dark Mode
constraint.description: TailwindCSS 4 uses @import "tailwindcss" syntax. Dark mode via 'media' strategy (prefers-color-scheme). Use dark: variants for all UI elements.

constraint.title: Strict TypeScript
constraint.description: TypeScript strict mode enabled. Import types from @realitycam/shared. No any types without justification.

constraint.title: Mobile-First Responsive Design
constraint.description: Mobile breakpoint: <640px (single column). Tablet: 640-1024px. Desktop: >1024px (max-width container). Use TailwindCSS breakpoint utilities.

constraint.title: Component Directory Structure
constraint.description: Components organized by feature: - components/Upload/ for FileDropzone - components/Evidence/ for ConfidenceBadge, EvidencePanel, EvidenceRow - components/Media/ for ImagePlaceholder

constraint.title: API Client Mock Pattern
constraint.description: API client should return mock/placeholder data for development. Use WebApiClient interface. Support getCapture and verifyFile methods.

constraint.title: Placeholder UI Pattern
constraint.description: All functional components are placeholders in this story. Show visual structure without backend connectivity. Include "Pending" or placeholder text to indicate non-functional state.

ac.description: Landing Page with File Upload Placeholder

note.title: FileDropzone Component Pattern
note.description: Create a dashed border dropzone with upload icon. Use cursor-pointer and hover states. Include "Drop a file here or click to upload" text and "Supports JPEG, PNG, HEIC" format text. Component is visual placeholder - click opens file picker but doesn't process files.

note.title: ConfidenceBadge Component Pattern
note.description: Color-coded badge based on confidence level. Use rounded-full pill shape with semantic colors. GREEN for high, YELLOW for medium, ORANGE for low, RED for suspicious, GRAY for pending.

note.title: Evidence Panel with Expand/Collapse
note.description: Expandable accordion panel for evidence details. Collapsed by default with expand indicator. Each row shows evidence type, status icon, and "Pending" text for placeholder state.

note.title: Verify Page Dynamic Route Pattern
note.description: Next.js 16 uses Promise-based params. Extract ID using await params pattern.

note.title: API Client Mock Implementation
note.description: API client returns placeholder data for development. verifyFile method returns 'no_record' status. getCapture returns null data with mock meta.

note.title: Previous Story Learnings from Story 1-4
note.description: 1. Dark Mode Pattern: Use system preference detection (prefers-color-scheme) 2. TypeScript Verification: Always run npx tsc --noEmit before marking complete 3. Responsive Design: Mobile-first approach with TailwindCSS breakpoints 4. Clean Architecture: Centralized color/style constants when appropriate 5. Component Structure: Separate placeholder components for future implementation
